staxel.village.dialogue.CaithWitch.line:: Ooooh...
It...it's no use...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can go no further...
If only there was ^c:d03e37;ice cream^c:pop;...
...mya.
^c:d03e37;Ice cream^c:pop;...
Oooh...
Would...would that ^c:d03e37;ice cream^c:pop; be for ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;?
Do you see anyone else?
Nope, just happen to be carrying it.
Oooh. ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can feel her energy returning!
Oh... No. Maybe not yet...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; still needs ^c:d03e37;lemon pie^c:pop;... mya.
^c:d03e37;Lemon pie^c:pop;...mya.
Is...is that ^c:d03e37;Lemon pie^c:pop; for ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;?
Well I already gave you the ice cream...
Pie? What pie?
Mmm... Just right.
Now all that's left is for you to surrender your soul to ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;!
No!
Absolutely not!
Maybe...
Well... I suppose in that case ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; could make do with some ^c:d03e37;chocolate chip cookies^c:pop;.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is willing to settle for ^c:d03e37;chocolate chip cookies^c:pop;.
Ah! Freshly ^c:d03e37;baked cookies^c:pop;!
Hurry, hurry!
Here.
With what?
Ah...! That is so much better mya!
Perhaps a proper introduction?
There aren't many people like ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; out there!
Father flew away so ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; followed...
But flying this far was a bit more...costly than expected...mya.
Would you happen to have seen him around?
He's...a bit unusual. You might not recognise him right away.
He tends to flap around a lot.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; sees you ^c:1486b0;{1-playername}^c:pop;!
Oh? What's this, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
A request? For ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;?
Hm hm. ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; understands mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; never saw anyone matching that description in her travels.
But! ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; does know a way to find missing people!
It's how she ended up finding her way here in search of Father...mya.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can scry! All that's needed is some kind of ^c:d03e37;catalyst^c:pop;...
Here, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will write down all the instructions for ^c:1486b0;Riah^c:pop;!
Come back anytime! ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is always waiting!
Ahh, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Back with a ^c:d03e37;catalyst^c:pop;?
Yes, yes mya! This will work.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; will try to see what she can find with this.
Mmmya! I have her mya—
I mean, I have her, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
That note should be all ^c:1486b0;Riah^c:pop; needs!
Now, for ^c:1486b0;Cirahna's^c:pop; payment... mya.
Your sou—
Why are you already shaking your head like that mya?
Fine mya! It was ^c:1486b0;Cirahna's^c:pop; fault for neglecting to discuss payment beforehand...
Maybe next time...
See...a long time ago, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; might have accidentally turned him into a butterfly mya...
It was all in good fun...until he flew away and ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; couldn't find him...
Ah! He's here? Truly mya?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will go and see him straight away!
Even if he doesn't want to see her, it doesn't matter!
Soon... ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will go soon...
There are a few things to take care of first...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; met with father at last!
You have no idea how long it's been... mya...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will thank you properly someday! All good things come back around!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; welcomes your rare visits, ^c:1486b0;{1-playername}^c:pop;.
It can be lonely out in the woods with no one to talk to...mya.
But then, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; doubts they would appreciate her presence in the village either...
It's too noisy there anyway!
There was one girl though...an old friend. If she were to move in...that would be perfect!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; doesn't think it will be easy though...
That girl had...certain peculiarities. She loved ^c:1486b0;mushrooms^c:pop; more than anything else!
If you build her a house, it needs to have lots of ^c:1486b0;mushrooms^c:pop;...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; thinks that these would be perfect!
Some of the ^c:1486b0;mushrooms^c:pop; might be a bit hard to find though...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has seen some of the rarer ones in the ^c:1486b0;mines^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;forests^c:pop;...
Having trouble finding some of the ^c:1486b0;mushrooms^c:pop;?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; thinks she saw the rarer ones in the ^c:1486b0;mines^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;forests^c:pop;...
That's quite a fancy house, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; almost wishes it was hers... mya.
But somehow...something still seems missing...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has a feeling that this might be just what's needed to finish it off!
It might take a few days, but that will grow a very special ^c:1486b0;mushrooms^c:pop;!
How is the ^c:1486b0;mushrooms^c:pop; growing, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Perfect, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Perfect mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; hopes her friend will move in, but only time will tell...
Perhaps ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; should reward ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop; with a binding of souls?
No? Perhaps that's fair.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; hopes that this will be enough to express her thanks, mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is always waiting for your next visit!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; saw you coming, ^c:1486b0;{1-playername}^c:pop;!
It's nice of you to come looking!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has been starting to get back pain recently...
The forest floor isn't the most comfortable place to sleep, mya...
Maybe...maybe you'd be willing to build ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; a small hut in a tree?
The ^c:1486b0;meadow^c:pop; has lots of big hollow trees! One of those would be perfect!
As long as it's not in the ^c:1486b0;village^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will be happy!
Ooooh... ^c:1486b0;{0-name}'s^c:pop; back hurts, mya...
A comfortable bed...that's all she asks...
But in a ^c:1486b0;meadow tree^c:pop;...
Amazing, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Amazing!
No amount of magic could make something like that mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; doesn't really know how to express her thanks right now...
Could you do one last thing to give ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; time to think about it?
See, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; learnt everything she knows from mother...but mother isn't around any more mya...
Father still won't talk to ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; properly mya...but maybe he'd talk to you...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; needs something that belonged to mother. It doesn't matter what.
Did you speak to father yet? ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; doesn't think he will listen to her...
Did you get it ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;? Did you get it, mya?
Yes, yes! ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; remembers this!
The memories... mya...
Did father say anything to you?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can imagine him warning you about her!
But that's just silly, mya. ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is careful and responsible.
For now, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will give you this as a reward, but she has big things planned!
Big things, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Hello, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. ^c:1486b0;{1-name}^c:pop; hasn't seen you in a while mya.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is still very happy with her new home, but has started running into a problem...
It needs opening a bit more to the magic...especially if you are going to be using it too...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can give you some more ^c:1486b0;blueprints^c:pop;! to help you expand it!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will wait with bated breath!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is watching your progress, ^c:1486b0;{1-playername}^c:pop;.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can't wait!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; expected no less from the legendary builder!
Now all that remains is the most important part...
The part ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has been waiting for mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has been working day and night forever to prepare!
But first, she needs a few small bits and pieces from you...
A ^c:1486b0;length of lumber^c:pop;, six of each ^c:1486b0;coloured petal^c:pop;, a ^c:1486b0;butterfly^c:pop;...
And most important of all, a ^c:1486b0;star jelly^c:pop; mya!
Do you think you could find those? It shouldn't be too hard compared to what you've already done!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will keep waiting until she has the parts in hand!
Yes, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Yes!
These will work perfectly!
If you haven't managed to guess already, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is having you make a ^c:1486b0;wand^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; thought long and hard about the best way to thank you mya...
With a little help from mother, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; knows how to make you a splendid ^c:1486b0;wand^c:pop;!
Of course, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can't do the work. The wand has to be special!
You have to make it yourself!
First, you need to ^c:1486b0;combine^c:pop; all the ^c:1486b0;coloured petals^c:pop;.
Then you ^c:1486b0;combine^c:pop; those with the rest of the ingredients!
That won't be enough to make a true ^c:1486b0;wand^c:pop;, though...
Only ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; can do that with help from mother's trinket!
So bring back the ^c:1486b0;wand^c:pop; when it's ready!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; needs the base ^c:1486b0;wand^c:pop; before she can make it magic!
First, you need to ^c:1486b0;combine^c:pop; all the ^c:1486b0;coloured petals^c:pop;.
Then you ^c:1486b0;combine^c:pop; those with the ^c:1486b0;lumber^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;butterfly^c:pop;, and ^c:1486b0;star jelly^c:pop;!
Hmm... A bit rough maybe, but it will do!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; needs to concentrate now. Be careful not to disturb her!
And there we go! One magic-infused ^c:1486b0;wand^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will make a witch out of you yet!
Mother always said it was the sacred duty of any witch to foster a new generation, mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; plans to start that with you!
This is also a little something extra. It may come with a price later!
But for now you can have it for free...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has one final thing to say...
Even if ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; doesn't like being around people, she likes being around you!
It would be easier to train a new witch as a roomie, mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; isn't rude though. She'll wait for you to ask before moving in!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; knows why you're here, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
Always looking for help with magic...
Almost never just to pay ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; a visit mya...
But ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; forgives you. ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; always forgives.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; can see where the problem lies. Too much science!
If you just remove this and this and this, and then add two of these, the problem goes away!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; is certain that will do the trick!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; hopes you will come and visit more often...
Father sent you, didn't he mya?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; knows these things ahead of time, see?
If the fool man wants something, he should seek out ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; himself...
But for now, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop; will do.
For what father seeks, first you must bring one of each type of ^c:1486b0;butterfly^c:pop;.
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will wait patiently...mya.
Not enough, mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; needs more ^c:1486b0;butterflies^c:pop;! One of each type!
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is impressed, mya!
That was a lot of ^c:1486b0;butterflies^c:pop;!
That seed will grow a ^c:1486b0;rainbow flower^c:pop;.
Plant it, tend it, and eventually, something will happen...
...probably, mya.
Back again, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; expected as much...
This scroll will teach you how to make the base for a very special potion...
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; doesn't really want to have any part in this, but a little won't hurt...
Come back when the base is complete.
Mmm... ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; is not convinced the colours are quite right mya.
But it's probably close enough.
That ^c:1486b0;magic potion^c:pop; should do the trick.
Perhaps you should tell father to come himself next time?
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; won't make the whole potion.
That would be too much involvement.
Oh, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! ^c:1486b0;{1-name}^c:pop; knew you were coming!
^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; sent you, no? About the ^c:d03e37;fairy dust^c:pop;?
Is ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; really so scary that no one will come themselves, mya?
This ^c:d03e37;dust^c:pop; is extremely special... ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; has seen it only once before!
It came from a ^c:1486b0;Rubbish Fairy^c:pop;. It's a fairy that sucked in too much litter...
So sad...mya...
But maybe you could be able to help her?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; will just cast a simple spell to reveal her position on your map!
Now you should be able to find her with ease! In return, ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; intends to keep this ^c:d03e37;dust^c:pop;...mya.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; needs your help, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
You may have noticed that ^c:1486b0;Cirahna's friend^c:pop; is keeping a bit to herself...
She hasn't exactly been mingling with the other villagers all that much since her arrival.
It's possible she hasn't even reached out to you properly yet either!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; doesn't want to leave things like this!
That's why she needs you to help do something about it!
Will you?
Of course!
Maybe another time.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; isn't going anywhere.
Come back when you feel like it.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; knew you would say that!
You've always been a reliable individual!
Now, the trick to reaching ^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop; is through ^c:d03e37;mushrooms^c:pop;!
There's one particular ^c:d03e37;mushroom^c:pop; growing in the ^c:1486b0;mines^c:pop;...
There's one particular ^c:d03e37;mushroom^c:pop; growing in the ^c:1486b0;forests^c:pop;...
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; suspects that picking that will help you grow closer to ^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; suspects that picking that will help you grow closer to ^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop;!
There's one particular ^c:d03e37;mushroom^c:pop; somewhere...
Check the ^c:1486b0;mines^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Check the ^c:1486b0;forests^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; should know where it is soon...
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; suspects the ^c:d03e37;mushroom^c:pop; there is the key!
This is the one, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Hm? A strange land?
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; isn't really sure what you mean...
However, she can guarantee that if you drink this ^c:d03e37;potion^c:pop;, it will help you befriend ^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop;!
Ah, you came, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
Terrible things have happened!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; can only imagine that one of ^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop;'s experiments went wrong!
Mushrooms everywhere!
You have to go and help her!
Hurry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop; needs you!
She's being stubborn, isn't she?
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; knew this would happen!
Having so many mushrooms in such a confined space will be disaster!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; doesn't like the thought of inhaling all those spores!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; will have you help fix this before it's too late.
Firstly, we'll need a specimen of the ^c:d03e37;mushrooms^c:pop; growing in ^c:1486b0;Morel's house^c:pop;...
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; will need one of your ^c:d03e37;watering cans^c:pop; to act as a base.
Finally, ^c:d03e37;10 starbits^c:pop;, some ^c:d03e37;salt^c:pop;, and a batch of ^c:d03e37;chocolate cookies^c:pop;!
Did you get all that?
There's no time to dilly-dally, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; needs one of the ^c:d03e37;mushrooms^c:pop; growing in ^c:1486b0;Morel's house^c:pop;...
...one of your ^c:d03e37;watering cans^c:pop;, ^c:d03e37;10 starbits^c:pop;, and some ^c:d03e37;salt^c:pop;.
Oh, and don't forget the batch of ^c:d03e37;chocolate cookies^c:pop;!
This is perfect, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; is very impressed! You even got the ^c:d03e37;chocolate cookies^c:pop;!
Just one moment...
This is ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;'s latest creation!
If you spray it over ^c:d03e37;weeds^c:pop; or ^c:d03e37;mushrooms^c:pop;, they'll be gone in a flash!
What were the ^c:d03e37;chocolate cookies^c:pop; for?
Well... ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; was getting a bit hungry...
But that's not important! You need to try this out first!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; has hidden a few large mushrooms around the village.
Melt them all and we can be sure it's working!
Oh, and you might want to try it out on ^c:1486b0;Vorlen^c:pop; too...
Just to make sure it's safe!
From the angry mail ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; received, it would appear your tests were successful!
Now it's time for the main event...
Clean up ^c:1486b0;Morel's house^c:pop;!
She might not like it at first, but this has to be done!
Have you finished testing your new tool yet?
Make sure to try it out on ^c:1486b0;Vorlen^c:pop; too...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
I think the spores are reaching me even here...
You need to clean up ^c:1486b0;Morel's house^c:pop;!
Ahh! So much better!
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; can breathe safely again!
^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop; might not realise it yet, but it's better this way.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; thanks you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; hopes this will suffice as a reward on ^c:1486b0;Morel^c:pop;'s behalf.
